snippet.title: GUNDAM VERSUS Gameplay Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Newtypes! GUNDAM VERSUS, the action packed arcade smash hit, is coming to the West.  With over 90 mobile suits available, GUNDAM fans can master unique weapon systems and new mobility options to outsmart their opponents.  

Built from the ground up exclusively for the PS4, GUNDAM VERSUS will arrive in Fall 2017.  

Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment: 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous/?hl=en
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS/
Tumblr: http://bandainamcous.tumblr.com/
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/bandainamcous
